frontMatter.title: Concurrent Programming with Go
frontMatter.description: Learn how to write concurrent programs in Go using goroutines and channels. This course covers concurrency patterns, synchronization, and best practices for writing efficient concurrent code in Go.

labs.title: Introduction to Goroutines
labs.description: Learn about goroutines and how to create concurrent functions.

labs.title: Working with Channels
labs.description: Master Go channels for communication between goroutines.

labs.title: Synchronization Patterns
labs.description: Learn different patterns for synchronizing concurrent operations.
